{{Infobox adult biography | name = Montana Fishburne | image = | caption = | birth_name = Montana Fishburne | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|mf=yes|1991|9|7}} | birth_place = [[United States]] | death_date = | death_place = | spouse = | height = | weight = | eye_color = Brown | hair_color = Black | ethnicity = [[African American]]
[[Bahamian American]] | alias = Chippy D.
Chippie D. | number_of_films = 2 (per [[IAFD]]) | website = | spelling = }} '''Montana Fishburne''' (born September 7, 1991){{cite web|title=Personal Bio: Montana Fishburne| publisher=IAFD.com|url=http://www.iafd.com/person.rme/perfid=MontanaFishburne/gender=f/Montana-Fishburne.htm|accessdate=2010-08-25}} also known by her [[stage name]] '''Chippy D.''',{{cite news | title = Montana Fishburne says dad Laurence is 'very hurt' over her decision to star in porn flick| author=Kristie Cavanagh| publisher = NYDailyNews.com| url =http://www.nydailynews.com/gossip/2010/08/03/2010-08-03_montana_fishburne_says_her_dad_laurence_is_very_hurt_from_porn_flick.html | date =2010-08-03 | accessdate = 2010-08-16 | location=New York}} is an [[United States|American]] [[pornographic actress]]. She entered the [[adult film industry]] in 2010 at the age of 19. She said [[Kim Kardashian]], [[Paris Hilton]] and [[Sasha Grey]] inspired her to go into porn. She also said that she did it because she believes porn is a beautiful form of art and expression.http://www.sohh.com/2010/08/lola_monroe_on_montana_fishburnes_adult.htmlhttp://uk.eonline.com/uberblog/b194649_montana_fishburne_not_on_speaking_terms.htmlhttp://www.actressarchives.com/news/exclusive-montana-fishburne-responds-i-make-my-own-decisions == Personal life == Fishburne was born to mainstream actors [[Laurence Fishburne]] and Hajna O. Moss.{{cite news|title=Laurence Fishburne's 19-year-old daughter, Montana, to star in porn film for Vivid Entertainment|url=http://www.nydailynews.com/gossip/2010/07/30/2010-07-30_laurence_fishburnes_19yearold_daughter_montana_to_star_in_porn_film.html|author=Anthony Benigno|accessdate=2010-08-07 | location=New York | work=Daily News | date=2010-07-30}} She also has a brother, Langston and half-sister, Delilah. She revealed that her father is "very hurt" about her porn career, and initially stated that she believed he would eventually view it as a positive. She later stated that he had cut ties with her and that she was "no longer welcome in his life" due to her career choice.{{cite web | title = Fishburne cuts ties with daughter| author=WENN.com| publisher = WENN.com| url =http://jam.canoe.ca/Movies/2010/08/17/15048476-wenn-story.html | date =2010-08-17 | accessdate = 2010-08-24}} == Adult film career == In early August 2010, Freaky Empire released the [[Gonzo pornography|gonzo]] porn film ''Phattys Rhymes & Dimes 14'', which features an almost hour-long sex scene between Fishburne and porn actor [[Brian Pumper]].{{cite web | title = More Montana Fishburne Footage Surfaces| author=Steve Javors | publisher = AVN.com| url =http://business.avn.com/articles/More-Montana-Fishburne-Footage-Surfaces-405558.html | date =2010-07-30 | accessdate = 2010-08-16}} Fishburne later attempted to block the distribution of the film. Her legal team contacted Pumper, whom she claims leaked the rehearsal footage which was never intended to be released.http://jam.canoe.ca/Movies/2010/08/20/15087001-wenn-story.html She performs again in the film ''Montana Fishburne: An A-List Daughter Makes her XXX Debut'', released on August 10, 2010 by [[Vivid Entertainment]]. The film is over an hour long and features Fishburne in a car, a hotel room and a [[shopping mall]].{{cite web | title =Laurenceâs Daughter, Montana Fishburne, Stars in XXX Flick for Vivid | publisher =AVN.com | url =http://business.avn.com/articles/Larry-s-Daughter-Montana-Fishburne-Stars-in-XXX-Flick-for-Vivid-405471.html | date = 2010-07-30| accessdate = 2010-08-16}} Commenting on why she decided to make the film, she said "I view making this movie as an important first step in my career ... I've watched how successful [[Kim Kardashian]] became and I think a lot of it was due to the release of her sex tape by Vivid." Fishburne says she is in talks with Vivid{{cite web | title = AVN Exclusive: Montana Fishburne Speaks| author=Peter Warren| publisher = AVN.com| url =http://business.avn.com/articles/AVN-Exclusive-Montana-Fishburne-Speaks-406615.html | date =2010-08-06 | accessdate = 2010-08-16}} about signing a multi-picture deal due to the initial commercial success of her debut.{{cite web | title = Porn Again: Montana Fishburne Gets New XXX Offer| author=TMZ Staff| publisher = TMZ.com| url =http://www.tmz.com/2010/08/10/porn-vivid-entertainment-montana-fishburne-multi-picture-deal-laurence-fishburne/ | date =2010-08-11 | accessdate = 2010-08-22}} == Legal problems == Fishburne was arrested for [[prostitution]] in 2009. She reportedly cut a deal with prosecutors who dropped the solicitation and prostitution charges in exchange for her pleading no contest to misdemeanor criminal trespass and entering a work-alternative program.[http://carltonjordan.com/2010/08/04/carlton-jordan-exclusive-montana-fishburne-arrested-for-prostitution/ Montana Fishburne Arrested for Prostitution in Hollywood]. carltonjordan.com, 2010-08-04.{{cite web | title = Montana Fishburne explains what led to porn| author=E! Entertainment Television| publisher = msnbc.msn.com| url =http://today.msnbc.msn.com/id/38643392/ns/today-entertainment/ | date =2010-08-10 | accessdate = 2010-08-22}} In August 2010, Fishburne was charged by the L.A. City Attorney's Office with simple battery and false imprisonment when she allegedly broke into a woman's home, forced her into a bathroom and sexually assaulted her.{{cite web | title = Montana Fishburne to be charged with assault| author=Access Hollywood| publisher = msnbc.msn.com| url =http://today.msnbc.msn.com/id/38685047/ns/today-entertainment/ | date =2010-08-12 | accessdate = 2010-08-24}} == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == * {{MySpace|chippy-d|Montana Fishburne}} * {{Twitter|mfishburne|Montana Fishburne}} * {{IMDb name|3735059|Montana Fishburne}} * {{iafd name|id=MontanaFishburne|gender=female|name=Montana Fishburne}} * {{afdb name|id=57214|gender=female|name=Montana Fishburne}} {{Persondata | NAME = Fishburne, Montana | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = September 7, 1991 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[United States]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Fishburne, Montana}} [[Category:1991 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:American female adult models]] [[Category:American pornographic film actors]] [[Category:Female pornographic film actors]] [[Category:American socialites]] [[Category:American people of Bahamian descent]] [[Category:People from California]] [[Category:People from the Greater Los Angeles Area]] [[Category:People from New York City]] [[Category:People from Los Angeles County, California]] [[Category:African American pornographic film actors]] [[Category:Pornographic film actors from California]] [[es:Montana Fishburne]] [[hr:Montana Fishburne]] [[ja:ã¢ã³ã¿ãã»ãã£ãã·ã¥ãã¼ã³]]
